56

58 /* Suppress the mathlib.h warnings
59  * #48-D: incompatible redefinition of macro "TRUE"
60  * #48-D: incompatible redefinition of macro "FALSE"

68 
86 int32_t DPIFUtils_convertPointCloudCartesionToSpherical
87 (
88  DPIF_PointCloudCartesian *pointCloudCartesianIn,
89  DPIF_PointCloudSpherical *pointCloudSphericalOut,
90  uint16_t numPoints
91 )
92 {
93  int32_t retVal = 0;
94  float x, y, z;
95  float phi, theta;
96  float temp, range;
97  int16_t count;
98 
99  /* Basic error Checking */
100  if((pointCloudCartesianIn == NULL) || (pointCloudSphericalOut == NULL))
101  {
102  retVal = -1;
103  goto exit;
104  }
105 
106  if(numPoints == 0)
107  {
108  goto exit;
109  }
110 
111  for(count = 0; count < numPoints; count++)
112  {
113  /* Just for better readibility */
114  x = pointCloudCartesianIn[count].x;
115  y = pointCloudCartesianIn[count].y;
116  z = pointCloudCartesianIn[count].z;
117 
118  temp = (y*y) + (x*x) + (z*z);
119  if(temp > 0)
120  {
121  /* Calculate range */
122 #ifdef SUBSYS_DSS
123  range = sqrtsp(temp);
124 #else
125  range = sqrt(temp);
126 #endif
127  /* Calculate elevation angle */
128  phi = asin(z/range);
129  /* Calculate azimuth angle */
130  theta = asin(x/(range * cos(phi)));
131  }
132  else
133  {
134  /* set everything to 0 */
135  range = 0;
136  phi = 0;
137  theta = 0;
138  }
139 
140  /* Assign the values to output structure */
141  pointCloudSphericalOut[count].range = range;
142  pointCloudSphericalOut[count].azimuthAngle = theta;
143  pointCloudSphericalOut[count].elevAngle = phi;
144  pointCloudSphericalOut[count].velocity = pointCloudCartesianIn[count].velocity;
145  }
146 
147 exit:
148  return retVal;
149 
150 }
